summary: The U. S. Congress is one of the country's most important and misunderstood institutions. Ken Burns tells the story behind this branch of government.
cast: David McCullough|Charles McDowell|Barbara Fields|John C. Stennis|Alistair Cooke|Cokie Roberts|David Broder|George Tames|James MacGregor Burns|Jerome Dempsey|Shelby Foote|Ronnie Gilbert|Julie Harris|Derek Jacobi|Garrison Keillor|Walt MacPherson|Arthur Miller|Christopher Murney|Paul Roebling|Wendy Tilghman|Kurt Vonnegut Jr.|Douglas Turner Ward
title: The Congress
